hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: When do you want me to start? salvia hispanica semi di chia Pro-gun activists say the answer is to arm more people – the teachers in schools, regular citizens on the street, security people in commercial places. Does adding more guns work? Not really. A Mother Jones investigation last year showed that in the 62 mass shootings of the previous 30 years, not one had been stopped by an armed civilian. More guns just means more opportunity for another tragedy, even another accident. And what's more troubling still is that we have come to accept it as normal.
